Interface JobDelegate

All Superinterfaces:
java.io.Closeable
All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseJobDelegate, BaseMapper, BenchmarkExtracter, BenchmarkMapper, BenchmarkReducer, CompactMergeJob.Merge, ComputePartitionTableJob.Map, ComputePartitionTableJob.Reduce, CorpusExtractJob.Map, CorpusExtractJob.Reduce, FlowInitJob.Map, FlowInitJob.Reduce, FlowIterJob.Merge, FlowIterJob.Reduce, FlowTermJob.Merge, GlobalRankSumJob.Reduce, GlobalSortJob.Map, GlobalSortJob.Reduce, GraphBySourceJob.Reduce, IterJob.Combine, IterJob.Map, IterJob.Reduce, Mapper, MergeNodeAndRankMetaJob.Merge, Merger, NodeIndegreeJob.Combine, NodeIndegreeJob.Map, NodeIndegreeJob.Reduce, NodeMetadataJob.Map, NodeMetadataJob.Reduce, Reducer, TeleportationGrantJob.Reduce, UniqueNodeJob.Reduce, UniqueOutboundLinksJob.Reduce
public interface JobDelegate
extends java.io.Closeable

Represents a basic Map/Merge/Reduce code backend provided by a developer for running their job. emit, setup, teardown, etc.

getPartition

Partition getPartition()
Get the partition that a job is executing over. This is mostly used for reference purposes for a job to perform potentially partition specific operations and for unit testing.
